22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ka'b ibn Malik: I said: Messenger of Allah, to make my repentance complete I should divest myself of my property as sadaqah (alms) for Allah and His Apostle. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Retain some of your property, for that will be better for you. So he said: I shall retain the portion I have at Khaybar

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ نَذَرَ أَنْ يَتَصَدَّقَ بِمَالِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Vows To Give His Wealth In Charity
